info.name: proje
info.description: a UK estate agent named Iceberg Estates; It has difficulty keeping records of which house its employees will show, when and to which customers. The company manager, who wants to use his employees more effectively, especially wants to be able to control the length of the appointments, the time they allocate for appointments, and all these appointments without conflicts. In order to solve these problems, the company needs an application that simulates the scenario.

item.name: AppointmentsCrudController

request.description:
This request is to assignment Appointment to user

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • userID*: required|integer|max:30

response.name: validation - assignment

request.description:
This request is to add Appointment

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • email*: required|email|max:50
  • name*: required|max:50|min:5
  • surname*: required|max:50|min:5
  • phone*: required|max:15|min:9
  • date*: required|max:10|date|date_format:Y-m-d|after_or_equal:today
  • time*: required|date_format:H:i|after:11:00|before:20:00
  • address*: required|max:50|min:3

response.name: validation - addAppointments

request.description:
This request is to update Appointment

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • email*: required|email|max:50
  • name*: required|max:50|min:5
  • surname*: required|max:50|min:5
  • phone*: required|max:15|min:9
  • date*: required|max:10|date|date_format:Y-m-d|after_or_equal:today
  • time*: required|date_format:H:i|after:11:00|before:20:00
  • address*: required|max:50|min:3
  • userID*: required|max:50|min:1
  • tempFreezing*: required|max:1

response.name: validation - updateAppointments

request.description:
This request is to get Appointment

inputs in the request like below:

  • appointmentID *: http://localhost:8005/api/appointment/update/{appointmentID }

This request is to delete Appointment

inputs in the request like below:

  • appointmentID *: http://localhost:8005/api/appointment/delete/{appointmentID }

This request is to select Appointment

inputs in the request like below:

  • appointmentID *: http://localhost:8005/api/appointment/select/{appointmentID }

This request is to list Appointments

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • page*: required|max:25
  • perPage*: required|max:25
  • tempFreezing*: required|max:1
  • searchValue: max:30
  • date: max:10|min:10
  • userID*: integer|max:30

request.description: This request is to log out from system

This request is to log in to system

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • password *: [ 'required', 'string', 'max:64', 'min:8', 'regex:/[a-z]/', 'regex:/[A-Z]/', 'regex:/[0-9]/', 'regex:/[@$!%*#?&]/', ]
  • user name *: required|email|max:50

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • email*: required|email|max:50
  • name*: required|max:50|min:5
  • surname*: required|max:50|min:5

  • date*: required|max:10|date|date_format:Y-m-d|after_or_equal:today

  • address*: required|max:50|min:3

request.description:
This request is to add user by admin

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • email*: required|email|max:50
  • fullName*: required|max:50|min:5
  • password*: [ 'required', 'string', 'max:64', 'min:8', 'regex:/[a-z]/', 'regex:/[A-Z]/', 'regex:/[0-9]/', 'regex:/[@$!%*#?&]/', ]
  • phone*: required|max:15|min:9

response.name: validation - addUser

request.description:
This request is to update user by admin

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • email*: required|email|max:50
  • fullName*: required|max:50|min:5
  • password*: [ 'required', 'string', 'max:64', 'min:8', 'regex:/[a-z]/', 'regex:/[A-Z]/', 'regex:/[0-9]/', 'regex:/[@$!%*#?&]/', ]
  • phone*: required|max:15|min:9
  • gender: max:1|integer
  • birthDate: max:10|date|date_format:Y-m-d|before:today
  • tempFreezing: max:1|integer

response.name: validation - updateUser

request.description:
This request is to delete user

inputs in the request like below:

  • userID*: http://localhost:8005/api/user/delete/{userID}

This request is to select user

inputs in the request like below:

  • userID*: http://localhost:8005/api/user/select/{userID}

This request is to list users

inputs in the body of this request are like below:

  • page*: required|max:25
  • perPage*: required|max:25
  • tempFreezing*: required|max:1
  • searchValue: max:30
